title: About This Site
introduction: 'Convenient Calculation Toolbox' is a website that provides tools to streamline small daily calculations and tasks.
missionContent: Our mission is to make complex calculations and data processing easy and intuitive for everyone. We aim to provide simple, highly functional tools that free users from time-consuming tasks, allowing them to focus on more creative activities.
featureSimple: Simple and Intuitive UI/UX: Anyone can operate it easily without specialized knowledge.
featureFree: Completely Free: All tools are available completely free of charge, with no registration required.
featureNoInstall: No Installation Required: It runs directly in your web browser, so there is no need to install any software.
featureModernStack: Modern Technology: We leverage the latest technologies like Next.js and TypeScript to provide a fast and comfortable user experience.
techStackContent: This site was developed as part of a programming study, using a modern technology stack including Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/ui.
